questions: Would you rather be forced to listen to the same 10 songs on repeat for the rest of your life or forced to watch the same 5 movies on repeat for the rest of your life?
Would you rather have to write everything you say out by hand or only be able to speak in rhymes?
Would you rather go without shampoo for the rest of your life or toothpaste for the rest of your life?
Would you rather live in reality for the rest of your life or be in the matrix for the rest of your life?
Would you rather be extremely allergic to your favourite food or forced to eat your least favourite food once a week?
Would you rather be able to time travel within a certain range or be able to freeze time?

Would you rather have access to all the music ever written, but no way to play it, or be able to play any piece of music ever written on any instrument, but never be able to listen to any music again?
Would you rather get locked in a room with a lion, a tiger, a bear, and a monkey, or get locked in a room with 100 creepy little spiders?
Would you rather be able to fly with a damaged plane or travel with a slow boat?
Would you rather die in a horrible accident or live to 100 and never move or be able to talk again?
Would you rather never be able to play a musical instrument again or never be able to sing again?
Would you rather be completely physically disabled or be diagnosed with a terminal illness?
Would you rather be one of the worlds leading experts in a single field or be the most well-rounded and versatile person in the world?
Would you rather be stronger than average or smarter than average?
Would you rather be the richest person in the world or the smartest person in the world?
Would you rather eat a piece of food that was really healthy for you but tasted horrible or eat something that tasted great but was bad for you?
Would you rather get to witness something once in your lifetime that few others will ever see or get to witness something once in your lifetime that many others have seen?
Would you rather have a job that pays $70 an hour but lets you work from home or a job that pays $100 an hour but requires you to be physically present?
Would you rather have a peaceful existence where you never had to worry about the troubles of life, or live a more normal life full of risk and challenge?
Would you rather have to live out the rest of your life in the wilderness or live out the rest of your life in jail?
Would you rather live in a country where the government is almost always doing the right thing or live in a country where they have to listen to you?
Would you rather live in a country where you could speak the language fluently or would you rather be able to teleport?
Would you rather live in a world where everyone ignores you or in a world where everyone is mean to you?
Would you rather live in a world where there is no crime or no privacy?
Would you rather live in a world with no disease or live in a world where there is income equality?
Would you rather live another 100 years with your body in a state of perfect health or just age normally?
Would you rather live to 100 years old or live to 500 years old?
Would you rather never take the easy way out of anything ever again or stop procrastinating?
Would you rather only be able to find jobs that start at 1am or jobs that start at 5am?
Would you rather not care about what people thought about you or care about what people thought about you?
Would you rather only be able to live in a small city your entire life or only be able to live in a big city your entire life?
Would you rather read the first draft of the most popular book of all time or an obscure book that has just a handful of fans?
Would you rather spend a year completely alone or have a serious illness?
Would you rather spend the rest of your life with a perfect memory or be able to have perfect focus?
Would you rather spend your entire life travelling the world or living in one place your whole life?
Would you rather be allergic to chocolate or be allergic to cheese?
Would you rather give up all technology (cell phones, computers, etc.) or give up all movies, television, and books?
Would you rather be famous for all the wrong reasons or not famous at all?
Would you rather go to the hospital for a headache or to the dentist for a toothache?
Would you rather be attacked by a bear or attacked by a shark?
Would you rather be able to see a month into the future or have a perfect memory of a month into the past?
Would you rather be able to fly or be able to turn invisible?
Would you rather have no thumbs or no fingers?
Would you rather live in a future where people take everything too seriously or a future where people don’t take anything seriously?
Would you rather be smarter than everyone in your area or the richest person in your area?
Would you rather only be able to eat foods you can make with only one cooking tool or only be able to eat foods you can make in one minute?
Would you rather get rid of one bad habit or get one new good habit?
Would you rather never have to worry about money or never be tempted to buy things you dont need?
Would you rather only be able to go out at night or only be able to go out during the day?
Would you rather give up alcohol for the rest of your life or give up all dairy products for the rest of your life?
Would you rather have an exciting but dangerous life or a boring but meaningful life?
Would you rather only be able to read books for the rest of your life or only be able to watch movies for the rest of your life?
Would you rather have a guaranteed good job for the rest of your life or win the lottery and have a 50/50 chance of losing it all?
Would you rather lose all of your memories from your childhood or lose all of your memories from the last few years?
Would you rather have to choose to live on your own island or be forced to live with your entire family on an island?
Would you rather get a credit card with a $10,000 limit or $1,000 cash?
Would you rather live in the country or live in the city?
Would you rather have a good memory or be able to learn a new language easily?
Would you rather live in the Middle Ages or the future?
Would you rather be stranded on a desert island or trapped in a room?
